name: y
description: e-commerce application REST API using your knowledge of server-side web development. E-commerce applications are ubiquitous online and make up the back-bone of online business, making the skills used to build them invaluable for any budding entrepreneur or developer. This project requires that you build a fully-functioning e-commerce application REST API that allows users to perform various CRUD operations such as registering an account, browsing products for sale, etc.
author: Rahul D Lulla
